1: <pb/><t>¿Toc 'ay mach xchan 'ab'nc tas 'ix calc 'eli? ¿Tom 'ay mach x'ojcan 'el spoder Jehová ch'oxb'il yu'uj?</t>
2: <t>Yujto 'ix snib'j Dios to 'ix q'uib' jun schecb' cha, 'icha junc te wolte tz'ejm sch'an̈lyib' 'a lum tacn̈ lu'um. A jun cha, man̈ nib'b'ilc wal yilxi, may wal tas wach' yilx 'a 'a.</t>
3: <t>B'uchb'il, patcab'il 'el yuj yit 'anma'il. 'Ix 'ajx 'och yailal 'a yib'an̈, 'ix techj yu'uj yujto c'aync xon yab'n syail. 'Icha wal junc mach to man̈x smojc yilx 'ochi, 'ixta x'aji. Xqui patquiljec can 'eli, may yel'ch 'ayn̈ec.</t>
4: <t>A xcutjec qui nani, to a Dios 'ix 'a'n 'och syailal cha, sec tz'ijx can 'ejmi. Palta 'in to man̈ 'ichcta', 'in to a qui yailalec, a 'ix 'ajx 'och 'a yib'an̈, a 'ix yab' syal qui jeloc.</t>
5: <t>'Ix lajw sniwnal yuj qui mulec, xyab' syal sniwnal chi yuj qui tu'al. Yuj jun yailal 'ix 'och 'a yib'n̈ cha, yuj cha, 'ix 'och junc'ojlal 'a qui calc yet' Dios. Yujto 'ix yab' syal sniwnal, yuj cha, 'ix 'ajx qui q'uinlec.</t>
6: <pb/><t>On̈ sactzic qui masnil 'icha no calnelu, mun xoj xqui na junjn on̈ 'aja b'el 'aj tzon̈ laj 'atcni, palta ax Jehová, 'ix ya'ch jun tzo'n̈ qui mulc chi 'a yib'n̈ jun schecb' cha.</t>
7: <t>Til wal 'ix yutj eb' yixtni, toc 'ay tas 'ix yala, ton̈j sictac yaji. Xyi'n 'at eb' 'anma chi 'a 'aj tzmila, 'icha tz'aj yijx 'at junc no calnelu 'aj tzmilxi, 'ixta xyutj sb'a, may xon tas xyala, sictac yaj 'icha no calnelu tzjoxxi.</t>
8: <t>'Ix yij 'at eb' 'a preso, sb'eyc'ojlan eb' sec tzsatli, toc 'ayt eb' yit chon̈b' 'ix 'och 'il yu'uj. 'Ix 'ijx 'el 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic yuj smul eb' wit chon̈ab', yuj eb' xyab'n syail.</t>
9: <t>Wach'xam may smul, may 'aj xyixtj paxti junc mach, palta ata smuc eb' 'a 'aj mucn eb' maysch'olnil sb'eyb'al, ata xcan 'a scal eb' rico.</t>
10: <t>A Jehová a 'ix 'a'n yab' syail, 'icha wal yaj snani. 'Ix ya'n sb'a xajmb'al-l 'a yol sc'ab' chamel, sec tz'ajx lajwc smul smasnil 'anma yu'uj. Yuj cha, pitzn 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej. A jun cha, til wal 'oj 'aj yin̈til, ax ya'n 'el'choc Jehová tas nab'il yuj 'a yib'an̈.</t>
11: <t>A yic tox xlajw 'ec' jun tzo'n̈ yailal chi 'a yib'an̈, ax stzalj pax yiln 'och spac jun syailal cha, to man̈ nab'an̈ejoc. Til wal eb' 'oj 'ojcan el jun schecb' Dios cha, 'oj 'ochcn eb' wach'l yu'uj, yujto a 'oj 'i'nc 'el smul eb' 'a yib'an̈.</t>
12: <t>Yujn̈ej cha, ax ya'n Dios jun yopiso 'a scal eb' niwn yel'chi. 'Ay yaln yic yet' eb' x'a'n ganar owal, yujto 'ix ya'sb'a 'a yol sc'ab' chamel, 'icha tz'ajx 'och 'a yib'n̈ eb' maysch'olnil sb'eyb'al, 'ixta x'ajx 'och 'a yib'n̈ jun xo. Caw yel 'ix ya'cn 'och sb'a 'a yaln̈ smul smasnil 'anma', 'ix leslwi yuj eb', sec tz'ajx lajwc smul eb' cha.<f>[14]</f></t>
